description: The INFECTION_INDICATOR table contains detailed information about the auto-infection and rule-out infection rules that were used to add or indicate infections.

columns.name: INFECTION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the infection record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: INF_INDICATOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The indicator type category ID describing the method by which the infection was indicated.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Procedure Rule


Organism Rule


Rule-Out

columns.name: INDICATED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The UTC instant when the infection was indicated.

columns.name: INDICATING_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order that indicated the infection.

columns.name: INDICATING_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure where the auto-infection or rule-out infection rule that indicated the infection is specified.

columns.name: INDICATING_COMPONENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the component specified in the auto-infection rule.

columns.name: INDICATING_ORGANISM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the organism where the auto-infection or rule-out infection rule that indicated the infection is specified.

columns.name: INDICATING_ANTIBIOTIC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The antibiotic category ID matching the antibiotic specified in the auto-infection rule.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INDICATING_SUSCEPT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The susceptibility category ID specified in the auto-infection rule.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
